relation_pairs: This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (termination_trait_lib #43301)

A trait for implementing arbitrary return types in the main function. The c-main function only supports to return integers as return type. So, every type implementing the Termination trait has to be converted to an integer. The default implementations are returning libc::EXIT_SUCCESS to indicate a successful execution. In case of a failure, libc::EXIT_FAILURE is returned.
pub trait Termination { fn report(self) -> i32; }
Is called to get the representation of the value as status code. This status code is returned to the operating system.
This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (termination_trait_lib #43301)
